Rowan Atkinsons latest comedy bristles with life lessons. You cannot hope to trap a bee in a grand piano. Bees, as we know, are already endangered, so dont microwave them.

articles.title: Claudia Winkleman APOLOGISES to Strictly's Kristina Rihanoff over Ben Cohen row - Daily Mail
articles.description: Strictly's Claudia Winkleman has issued a grovelling apology to Kristina Rihanoff after falsely claiming her relationship with Ben Cohen began while they were on the show.
